text: namut ovunge mahar oba sandahan kara, (vivaha karagena) tibi, ovunta lam vimata perama talak kive nam, kavurun ata vivaha bandhanaya tikhenneda, ohu (svamipurusaya) nætahot æya (birinda) athæra dæmuvahot misa, oba (mahar vasayen) sandahan kara tibu dæyen adak æta. ehet oba, (oba tula) atahæra sahayogaya dima bhakti visvasayata itamat samipa vanneya. ebævin oba tula paropakari bhavaya amataka kara nodamanu. niyata vasayenma allah oba karana dæya avadhanayen yutuva balanneku vasayen sitinneya
